text: Niscaya'i asamana o yaminera srstite, rata o dinera bibartane ebam nadite naukasamuhera calacale manusera jan'ya kalyana rayeche. Ara allaha taâ€™ ala akasa theke ye pani nayila karechena, taddbara mrta yaminake sajiba kare tulechena ebam tate chariye diyechena sabarakama jiba-jantu. Ara abaha'oya paribartane ebam meghamalara ya tamra'i hukumera adhine asamana o yaminera majhe bicarana kare, niscaya'i se samasta bisayera majhe nidarsana rayeche bud'dhimana sampradayera jan'ye.
